TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputLanguage extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供管理輸入語言的方法和欄位。

span.span: Provides methods and fields to manage the input language.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 決定如何在鍵盤上的實體索引鍵的對應位置，或繪製到的語言字元的文化特性] / [鍵盤配置組的輸入的語言。An input language is a culture/keyboard layout pair that determines how the physical keys on a keyboard map or plot to characters in a language. 輸入的語言為基礎的 Windows 輸入法地區設定識別碼，例如由平台 SDK 函式傳回`GetKeyboardLayout`。The input language is based on a Windows input locale identifier, such as that returned by the Platform SDK function, `GetKeyboardLayout`. 輸入法地區設定識別項也稱為鍵盤配置 (HKL) 值的控制代碼。The input locale identifier is also called a handle to a keyboard layout (HKL) value. 使用`static`尋找所有已安裝對應的系統，以及變更執行緒或處理序的輸入的語言所提供的方法。Use the `static` methods provided to find all installed mappings of the system and to change the input language for a thread or process. 呼叫來取得目前輸入語言。Call to get the current input language. 呼叫預設輸入語言。Call for the default input language. 呼叫在此系統中取得所有已安裝的語言。Call to get all the installed languages in this system. 您有一份所有已安裝的語言之後，請使用若要變更目前輸入語言設定為不同的語言。After you have a list of all the installed languages, use to change the current input language to a different language. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得一份已安裝的語言。The following code example gets a list of installed languages. 這個範例需要`textBox1`具現化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已設為`true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一個範例會設定設為目前的輸入語言的預設輸入的語言。The next example sets the default input language as the current input language. 這個範例需要`textBox1`具現化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已設為`true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得目前輸入語言。The following code example gets the for the current input language. 文字方塊會顯示這個輸入語言和輸入語言的名稱。A text box displays this input language and the name of the input language. 此程式碼會假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. summary.span: 取得系統的預設輸入語言。

span.span: Gets the default input language for the system.
An representing the default input language for the system.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得預設輸入的語言，並列印其名稱，在文字方塊中。The following code example gets the default input language and prints its name in a text box. 此程式碼會假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage FromCulture(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromCulture (culture As CultureInfo) As InputLanguage

param.name: culture
param.span: ，指定要轉換的文化特性來源。

span.span: The that specifies the culture to convert from.

summary.span: 傳回與指定文化特性相關的輸入語言。

span.span: Returns the input language associated with the specified culture.
An that represents the previously selected input language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從已安裝鍵盤選取。The method selects from among installed keyboards. 具體來說，這個方法會執行下列作業：Specifically, this method performs the following operations: 1. 取得相關聯的 LCID `culture`。Gets the LCID associated with `culture`. 2. 取得可用的輸入的語言識別項 (HKLs) 的完整清單，從`GetKeyboardLayoutList`函式。Gets the full list of available input language identifiers (HKLs) from the `GetKeyboardLayoutList` function. 3. 尋找對應到從 LCID HKL `culture`，如果有的話。Finds the HKL that corresponds to the LCID from `culture`, if one is present. 4. 傳回與該 HKL 相關聯的已安裝的鍵盤。Returns the installed keyboard associated with that HKL. 5. 如果不找到任何鍵盤，則會傳回`null`。If no keyboard is found, returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 方法永遠不會嘗試載入，或如果其中一個未安裝的安裝其他的鍵盤`culture`。The method never tries to load or install an additional keyboard if one has not already been installed for `culture`. 使用平台 SDK 函式，`LoadKeyboardLayout`來安裝其他的鍵盤。Use the Platform SDK function, `LoadKeyboardLayout`, to install an additional keyboard. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定設為目前的輸入語言的預設輸入的語言。The following code example sets the default input language as the current input language. 首先，呼叫以取得系統的預設語言。First, is called to get the system default language. 接下來，呼叫以取得目前輸入的語言。Next, is called to get the current input language. 結果會列印在文字方塊中。The results are printed in a text box. 然後，呼叫預設輸入的語言，請變更為預設值的目前輸入的語言。Then, calling with the default input language changes the current input language to the default. 在文字方塊中，會顯示新的目前輸入的語言。The new current input language is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼會假設`textBox1`已具現化。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property InstalledInputLanguages As InputLanguageCollection

summary.span: 取得所有已安裝的輸入語言清單。

span.span: Gets a list of all installed input languages.

value.span: 物件的陣列，表示電腦上安裝的輸入語言。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the input languages installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取安裝在電腦上的所有輸入的語言，並顯示其名稱。The following code example retrieves all the input languages installed on the computer and displays their names. 程式碼會呼叫取得已安裝的語言。The code calls to get the installed languages. 在文字方塊中顯示語言名稱的清單。A text box displays the list of language names. 此程式碼會假設`textBox1`具現化且`textBox1.MultiLine`已設為`true`。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LayoutName As String
public: property System::String ^ LayoutName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得出現在電腦作業系統地區設定的目前鍵盤配置名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current keyboard layout as it appears in the regional settings of the operating system on the computer.
The name of the layout.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得與目前輸入語言關聯的文化特性，並顯示文化特性名稱。The following code example gets the culture associated with the current input language and displays the culture name. 首先，呼叫以取得目前輸入的語言。First, is called to get the current input language. 然後，會呼叫以取得這個輸入語言的文化特性資訊。Then, is called to get the culture information for this input language. 最後，擷取並顯示在文字方塊中。Finally, is retrieved and displayed in a text box. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
